Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that men in Eritrea must have two wives or go to jail, when in fact this is a false rumor that has been circulating since 2016.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove its validity.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Eritrean government has passed a law forcing men to marry multiple wives, which is not true.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Eritrean Minister of Information has dismissed this claim and stated that it is a hoax.
Falters at times: The claim falters by resurfacing multiple times despite being debunked and refuted by credible sources.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this claim.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation bias in this claim.
